name: Cat Wizard (abbeyhi)
description:
IN PROGRESS 

Platformer Game created for SAG Senior Project. 

A cat wizard goes on an adventure to defeat her evil enemies through the style of a platformer. The cat not only has to make it through each level alive but it must not be stopped by it’s treacherous paths and obstacles along the way. Each level increases with difficulty not only in the environment but in combat with enemies.
